metadata.title: Barber Depot Shaving Soap - The Best Shaving Soap - Hand Made - Thick Lather with Fresh Scent for Classic Wet Shaving Routine. 4oz (Lavender)
metadata.details: {"Brand": "Buybarber.com", "Scent": "Fresh,Lavender", "Skin Type": "All", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Unit Count": "1.00 Count", "Package Dimensions": "3.54 x 3.39 x 2.13 inches; 5.64 Ounces", "UPC": "749403382633"}

categorization.explanation: The product is a shaving soap, which is used in the process of hair removal. It is specifically designed for men's shaving routines, hence it fits best under the 'Men's' subcategory of 'Shave & Hair Removal' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
